entries.desc: Bind an event handler to the "click" JavaScript event, or trigger that event on an element.

entry.name: on
entry.title: click event
entry.desc: Bind an event handler to the "click" JavaScript event.

argument.name: eventData
argument.desc: An object containing data that will be passed to the event handler.

argument.name: handler
argument.desc: A function to execute each time the event is triggered.

longdesc.p: The click event is sent to an element when the mouse pointer is over the element, and the mouse button is pressed and released. Any HTML element can receive this event. For example, consider the HTML:
